javadoc: CodeUnitLocation provides information about the location in a program within a CodeUnit.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Create a new CodeUnitLocation for the given address.
 The address will be adjusted to the beginning of the code unit containing
 that address(if it exists).  The original address can be retrieved using
 the "getByteAddress()" method.

params.name: program
params.comment: the program for obtaining the code unit

params.name: addr
params.comment: address of the location; should not be null

params.name: componentPath
params.comment:
if this is not null it is the path to a data
 component inside of another data component

params.name: col
params.comment: - the display item index on the given row. (Note most fields only have one display item per row)

params.name: charOffset
params.comment: - the character offset within the display item.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Create a new CodeUnitLocation using the given information

params.name: program
params.comment: the program for obtaining the code unit

params.name: addr
params.comment: address of the location; should be on a code unit boundary.

params.name: byteAddr
params.comment: the address of specific byte within the code unit at the addr address.

params.name: componentPath
params.comment:
if this is not null it is the path to a data
 component inside of another data component

params.name: col
params.comment: - the display item index on the given row. (Note most fields only have one display item per row)

params.name: charOffset
params.comment: - the character offset within the display item.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Create a new CodeUnitLocation for the given address.
 The address will be adjusted to the beginning of the code unit containing
 that address(if it exists).  The original address can be retrieved using
 the "getByteAddress()" method.

params.name: program
params.comment: the program for obtaining the code unit

params.name: addr
params.comment: address of the location; should not be null

params.name: col
params.comment: - the display item index on the given row. (Note most fields only have one display item per row)

params.name: charOffset
params.comment: - the character offset within the display item.

methods.javadoc: Default constructor for a code unit location needed for restoring from XML.

methods.comment: Default constructor for a code unit location needed for restoring from XML.

name: CodeUnitLocation
comment:
CodeUnitLocation provides information about the location
 in a program within a CodeUnit.
